alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Gulf; Jackson; Liberty; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 15 at 2:45AM EST until December 15 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 AM EST/300 AM CST/ FOR SOUTHERN JACKSON...GULF...BAY AND CALHOUN COUNTIES IN THE PANHANDLE OF FLORIDA...NORTHWESTERN LIBERTY COUNTY IN BIG BEND OF FLORIDA AND SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES IN THE PANHANDLE OF FLORIDA... At 245 AM EST/145 AM CST/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Marianna to 35 miles southwest of Tyndall Air Force Base, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Callaway, Blountstown, Marianna, Port St. Joe, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Chattahoochee, Orange, Parker, Wewahitchka, Sneads, Bristol, Cottondale, Grand Ridge and Altha. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EST/800 AM CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.

area.areaDesc: Bay; Calhoun; Gulf; Jackson; Liberty; Washington
